name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Hide Secret Chats & Private mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a native button to hide selected chats - Perfect for shared desktops & screen sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ”’ Essential privacy tool for ChatGPT users who work in shared environments or frequently share their screens.

Key Features:

One-Click Privacy: Hide any chat instantly from ChatGPT's native menu
Shared Desktop Ready: Perfect for open offices and shared workstations
Screen Sharing Protection: Hide personal chats during meetings
Remote Work Safe: Maintain privacy during remote desktop sessions
Quick Recovery: Access all hidden chats through a simple popup

Perfect for:

Working on shared computers
Remote team screen sharing
IT support sessions
Open office environments
Managing work/personal chat separation
Keeping your sidebar organized

Simple to Use:

Click the three dots menu on any chat
Select 'Hide Chat' to make it private
Access hidden chats anytime via the extension icon
Restore chats with one click when needed

Privacy & Security:

Integrates naturally with ChatGPT's interface
All data stays private on your device
No external data sharing
Works offline
